text: Lindsay McNamara (13 August 1918 – 7 October 1991) was a former Australian rules footballer who played with South Melbourne and Fitzroy in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == External links == * * Category:1918 births Category:1991 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Sydney Swans players Category:Fitzroy Football Club players Category:Sturt Football Club players
title: Lindsay McNamara
